name: My Talking Crying | BETA V1.0.0
description:
Sparkle! Sparkle! Sparkling Scary Mansion~

What's New from Yaya and Kuku?

A brand new BETA App! My Talking Crying was developed and created from YayaLand Scary Mansion Apps: Our Yayas. Your Play! Read the manual in the game to know how she works!

Inspired by Catch! Teenieping Talking Teenieping, Crying and her other Speci-pals are free in training!
